item.title: TDD - The Unfulfilled Promise
item.description: There are few things that divide the software community as much as the practice of Test Driven Development (TDD). While some, especially those coming from an XP background, believe it to be the software development equivalent of sliced bread, others believe its a sheer waste of time. So what is it about TDD that elicits such divisive opinions? In our experience, it’s down to the benefits promised in theory but difficult to materialize in practice!
